description:
Super Pokémon Rumble allows
players to battle against waves of
opposing wind-up Toy Pokémon, and
connect with a friend to battle
together. With over 600 Toy Pokémon
to collect, including those from the
Pokémon Black Version and Pokémon
White Version games, it's going to be
a Super Pokémon Rumble!
name: Super Pokémon™ Rumble
